title: Need help
body: What is the command for CMD to ping Riot OCE in Sydney? Does anyone know? Much appreciated

replies.body:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2

or just start a custom game and check your ping.

Omg thanks so much! No the issue is much bigger then checking ping, i need to see if it is Riot server or ISP i spike at night, i get 12 ping during the day and when its 8-10pm it spikes to like 70 which is a huge jump. So thats why l needed the tracert! Thanks so much
